titles.title: Full Enrollment Environmental Quality Incentives Program (FEEQIP) Act of 2004
To modify and improve the funding structure of the Environmental Quality Incentives Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development and Research.

committee.subcommittee: Conservation, Credit, Rural Development, and Research
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 4/21/2004--Introduced. Full Enrollment Environmental Quality Incentives Program (FEEQIP) Act of 2004 - Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to delete current provisions specifying per-year funding amounts for the environmental quality incentives program from the Commodity Credit Corporation.
